data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Working with Time series is a common practice in business
    intelligence. An object was needed to provide common functionality
    for time series. This includes stretching, shrinking, normalizing,
    synchronizing two series, deseasonalizing and clipping. Future
    functionality might include correlation, regression and many others.

    Also the timeseries object provides a pack function so it could be
    stored in a text field in a database.
